tagline: Route planning for walking, cycling, and e-bikes.
planSubtitle: Choose a mode, a type, and your locations.
planSelectModeTypeHint: Select a mode and a type to show the location search.
loopDistanceHelp: A loop returns to the start point while avoiding retracing the same roads as much as possible.

title.pending: Ready to calculate your route as soon as:

missing.mode: you have chosen a mode (walk, bike or e-bike)
missing.type: you have chosen a type (one-way or loop)
missing.start: you have selected a departure location
missing.distance: you have entered a target distance

speedEstimateProfileHint: Speed is configured in the Profiles tab.
speedEstimateEmpty: Select a mode to estimate speed.
routeErrorMissingPlace: Select a start and destination from the list.
routeErrorUnavailable: The routing engine is being prepared. Please try again in a few minutes.
routeErrorTimeout: The calculation took too long. Please try again in a few minutes.
routeErrorGateway: The routing engine did not respond correctly. Please try again in a few minutes.
routeErrorFailed: Unable to compute the route right now.
loopErrorFailed: Unable to generate a satisfying loop.
mapPlaceholderTitle: The map will appear after calculation
mapPlaceholderBody: Run a calculation from Plan to activate the map.
exportGpxFailed: Unable to export GPX right now.
navigationNoRouteData: Not enough route data to start navigation.
navigationGpsUnsupported: Geolocation is unavailable on this device.
navigationGpsPermissionDenied: GPS access denied. Allow geolocation for GPS mode.
navigationGpsTimeout: GPS took too long to respond.
navigationGpsHint: GPS mode follows your real position along the route.
mapElevationUnavailable: Elevation profile is unavailable for this route.
mapElevationLoopUnavailable: Loop elevation details will be added in a future update.
mapOverlapLowHelp: Low overlap: the loop rarely reuses the same segments.
mapOverlapMediumHelp: Medium overlap: some sections are shared.
mapOverlapHighHelp: High overlap: many sections are reused.
poiAlertNotificationsUnsupported: System notifications are not supported by this browser.
poiAlertNotificationsDenied: Notifications are blocked in your browser.
poiAlertSelectAtLeastOne: Select at least one category for alerts.
navigationOptionsCompactHint: Tune these options before starting navigation.
detourAddressBookEmpty: No address available in address book.
poisPlaceholder: Points of interest will be listed here.
profilesSubtitle: Adjust speeds to estimate travel time.
profileSpeedHint: This speed is used to estimate trip duration.
profileAssistDescriptionLow: The engine avoids climbs more aggressively and favors flatter routes.
profileAssistDescriptionMedium: The engine keeps a balanced trade-off between directness and elevation.
profileAssistDescriptionHigh: The engine accepts more elevation to allow potentially more direct routes.
helpSubtitle: Service status, product information, and user feedback channel.
helpDiagnosticBody: Review the routing engine and platform status.
helpRoutingEngineBody: The engine computes routes and updates map data automatically in background.
helpRoutingEngineAutoUpdate: Map data update is running automatically in background.
helpValhallaStatusUnavailable: Unable to load routing engine status.
helpPlatformStatusBody: Distributed cache status used server-side for technical session handling.
helpFeedbackBody: Send a bug report, remark, or suggestion.
helpFeedbackMessagePlaceholder: Describe context, steps, and expected behavior.
helpFeedbackSubmitSuccess: Thank you, your feedback was sent.
helpFeedbackSubmitError: Unable to send feedback right now.
installPromptBody: Add BikeVoyager to your home screen for quick access.
helpMentionsBody: BikeVoyager relies on open-source components and open data providers.
helpMentionsItem6: Geo API Gouv + Overpass API: addresses and POI lookup.
dataPageSubtitle: Manage your trips, backups, and cloud synchronization.
dataHubCloudSubtitle: Store your backups in your cloud.
dataHubBody: Save all your data, then import it on another device when needed.
addressBookBody: Save personal addresses for quick reuse.
addressBookMissingPlace: Select an address before saving a contact.
addressBookDeleteConfirmBody: Delete address "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
addressBookFilterNoMatch: No address matches the active filter.
deliveryPlannerBody: Choose a start and stops, then let BikeVoyager optimize the route.
deliveryStopsOrderEmpty: Select stops to define an order.
deliveryRouteBuildFailed: Unable to compute the round right now.
deliveryRouteBuiltSuccessOrdered: Round computed using your custom order across {{count}} stop(s).
deliveryRouteSummaryPending: Select a start and stops to compute an optimized round.
deliveryRouteSummaryNoReturn: Start: {{start}} • {{count}} stop(s) • no return to start.
dataLoopSaveUnavailable: Generate a loop to enable saving.
dataImportEncryptedUnsupported: Encrypted files are no longer supported. Export a non-encrypted backup.
dataSavedTripDeleteConfirmBody: Delete trip "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
cloudSyncBody: Your data stays saved locally and can be synced with your OneDrive or Google Drive space.
cloudProviderMissingClientId: This cloud provider is currently unavailable. Choose another provider or try again later.
cloudUnavailable: Cloud sync is not enabled on this installation. Your data remains saved locally.
cloudUnavailableAdminHint: To enable sign-in, an administrator must configure Google Drive or OneDrive on the server.
cloudReconnectPromptBody: Your {{provider}} cloud service is configured, but your session expired. Reconnect to resume synchronization.
cloudNotConnected: No cloud account connected for this provider.
cloudConnectedToOtherProvider: A {{provider}} account is connected. Switch provider or reconnect.
cloudAutoBackupToggleHint: Enable to sync your data automatically after each change.
cloudRestoreNotFound: No remote backup found. Use "Save backup" to create the first one.
cloudRestoreDecisionPrompt: Cloud backup detected. Choose merge or replace.
cloudRestoreAlreadyUpToDate: No difference detected: your local data is already up to date.
cloudRestoreKeepLocal: Cloud restore skipped. Your local data has been kept.
cloudRestoreDecisionBody: A remote backup already exists. Do you want to merge it with your local data or replace local data?
cloudRestoreDecisionBodyWithDate: A remote backup updated on {{value}} already exists. Do you want to merge it with your local data or replace local data?
cloudRestoreBackupMergedSynced: Merge completed, cloud backup updated automatically.
cloudSecurityItem1: The exported file may contain your locations and trip habits.
cloudSecurityItem2: Use cloud storage protected with MFA and trusted devices.
cloudSecurityItem3: Cloud tokens stay server-side (HttpOnly session), not in browser local storage.
